0.text: Innate: Lillia's abilities apply Dream Dust to enemies hit, which deals「 6% (+ 1.2% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health total magic damage over 3 seconds, 」「 1% (+ 0.2% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health magic damage every 0.5 seconds over 3 seconds, 」capped at 40 − 100 (based on level) damage against  monsters.
0.html: Innate: Lillia's abilities apply Dream Dust to enemies hit, which deals「 6% (+ 1.2% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health total magic damage over 3 seconds, 」「 1% (+ 0.2% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health magic damage every 0.5 seconds over 3 seconds, 」capped at 40 − 100 (based on level) damage against monsters.

1.text: Lillia  heals for 24 − 75 (based on level) (+ 5.4% AP) against large  monsters and 10.5 − 124.5 (based on level) (+ 18% AP) against  champions over the duration of Dream Dust, reduced to 33% effectiveness for each target beyond the first. She may only heal against 1  monster at a time.
1.html: Lillia heals for 24 − 75 (based on level) (+ 5.4% AP) against large monsters and 10.5 − 124.5 (based on level) (+ 18% AP) against champions over the duration of Dream Dust, reduced to 33% effectiveness for each target beyond the first. She may only heal against 1 monster at a time.

0.text: Passive: Whenever Lillia's abilities hit at least one enemy, she generates a stack of Prance for 6.5 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 4 times. Stacks expire by one every 1.5 seconds. Prance: For each stack, Lillia gains  bonus movement speed.
0.html:
Passive: Whenever Lillia's abilities hit at least one enemy, she generates a stack of Prance for 6.5 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 4 times. Stacks expire by one every 1.5 seconds.

Prance: For each stack, Lillia gains  bonus movement speed.

1.text: Active: Lillia swings her censer around her, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies. Enemies hit within the outer edge of the area additionally take the same amount as bonus true damage.
1.html: Active: Lillia swings her censer around her, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies. Enemies hit within the outer edge of the area additionally take the same amount as bonus true damage.

0.text: Active: Lillia  dashes to 150 units in front of the target area over 0.759 seconds, though not through terrain, and deals magic damage in an area around the target spot. Enemies hit within the epicenter are dealt  200% increased damage.
0.html: Active: Lillia dashes to 150 units in front of the target area over 0.759 seconds, though not through terrain, and deals magic damage in an area around the target spot. Enemies hit within the epicenter are dealt 200% increased damage.

1.text: Watch Out! Eep! deals 50% damage to  minions.
1.html: Watch Out! Eep! deals 50% damage to minions.

2.text: Watch Out! Eep! will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
2.html: Watch Out! Eep! will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Lillia lobs a seed at the target area that rolls forward indefinitely. The seed detonates upon hitting an enemy or terrain while on the ground, dealing magic damage to enemies in a cone,  slowing them by 40% for 3 seconds and  revealing them for 2 seconds.
0.html: Active: Lillia lobs a seed at the target area that rolls forward indefinitely. The seed detonates upon hitting an enemy or terrain while on the ground, dealing magic damage to enemies in a cone, slowing them by 40% for 3 seconds and revealing them for 2 seconds.

1.text: Swirlseed will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
1.html: Swirlseed will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Lillia casts a magical lullaby over all targetable enemy  champions affected by  Dream Dust, which arrives after 0.3 seconds and renders them  drowsy for 1.5 seconds,  slowing them by 10%. After the duration, they fall  asleep for a few seconds.
0.html: Active: Lillia casts a magical lullaby over all targetable enemy champions affected by Dream Dust, which arrives after 0.3 seconds and renders them drowsy for 1.5 seconds, slowing them by 10%. After the duration, they fall asleep for a few seconds.

1.text: The next instance of non- persistent non- minion non-small and medium  monster damage taken by each of the  sleeping targets consumes the debuff to deal additional magic damage.
1.html: The next instance of non- persistent non- minion non-small and medium monster damage taken by each of the sleeping targets consumes the debuff to deal additional magic damage.

2.text: An enemy champion affected by  Dream Dust is required to cast this ability.
2.html: An enemy champion affected by Dream Dust is required to cast this ability.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+7% omnivamp against monsters

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sear: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.
Unique – Chilling Path: Using Smite 5 times consumes this item to upgrade your Smite into Chilling Smite, doubling its damage, and grants all of this item's effects permanently after a 2.5-second delay.
Unique – Huntsman: Killing large monsters grants 60 bonus experience. The first large monster killed grants an additional 150 bonus experience, for a total of 210. If you are at least 2 levels below the average level of the game, large monster kills grant 50 bonus experience per level below the average level of all players in the game. If your gold from minions is greater than 40% your gold from monsters, a lane minion will grant 13 less gold and 50% reduced experience. This penalty is removed at 20 minutes.
Unique – Recoup: Regenerate up to 8 − 18 (based on level) mana per second when in the jungle or river, based on missing mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SEAR: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.

Keywords

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Torment: Dealing ability damage burns enemies, causing them to take「 50 (+ 6% AP) (+ 4% target's maximum health) total magic damage over 4 seconds, capped at 400 against monsters. 」「 6.25 (+ 0.75% AP) (+ 0.5% target's maximum health) magic damage every 0.5 seconds over 4 seconds, capped at 50 against monsters. 」
Unique – Agony: Deal 0% − 12% (based on target's bonus health) bonus magic damage against enemy champions.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – TORMENT: Dealing ability damage burns enemies, causing them to take「 50 (+ 6% AP) (+ 4% target's maximum health) total magic damage over 4 seconds, capped at 400 against monsters. 」

st_flatStats0.concerningText: Active: Lillia casts a magical lullaby over all targetable enemy  champions affected by  Dream Dust, which arrives after 0.3 seconds and renders them  drowsy for 1.5 seconds,  slowing them by 10%. After the duration, they fall  asleep for a few seconds.
